oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 2018 Census of Canadian Academic Librarians
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Revitt, Eva; Magnus, Ebony; & Wright, John
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Canada's second census of Canadian academic librarians was conducted by the Canadian Association of Academic Librarians (CAPAL) from June to September, 2018.
The goal of the census is to build a comprehensive demographic picture of the profession of academic librarianship by collecting data about librarians working in colleges and university libraries in Canada. It is the intention of CAPAL to share the data for research, policy development, and education purposes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social Sciences
